website_summaries.verdict: An attractive, versatile fan that does a good job moving air, but it may not suit your needs if quality light is important to you.
pros: Sleek, low-profile design with contemporary styling
Produces nice air movement that's ideal for outdoor living areas and large rooms
cons: It's on the higher end of the price range, and it's difficult to install

customer_reviews.title: LED bulb replacement instructions
customer_reviews.text: The included halogen bulbs get quite hot in use, and for the first few days create a slight burning smell. We chose to replace these bulbs with LEDs, but most LEDs we found on Amazon (both dimming and non-dimming) do not turn completely off when used in this fan. This prevents you from having a dark room at night when the fan is active (which we found annoying). We finally found one LED goes 100% off using the remote control:It's not dimable, but this was preferable to the alternative. Let us know if you find a dimmable version which also works.
customer_reviews.author: Paint a bird on it

customer_reviews.title: Light is TOO dim
customer_reviews.text: Light is pretty much nonexistent. Already paid to install and threw box away....will have to replace.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: Control unit died after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: I hate this fan. Installed it in the guest bedroom. But it decided to quit on me just before the guests arrived. When you turn the switch on the fan starts to rotate, but is completely unresponsive to the remote. No light either. Tried to re-sync using the sync procedure, but no luck. I suspect the control unit is dead. I'd stay away from this fan. Too many things that can go wrong. You may like it today, but just give it a few months, and it it will quit on you.
customer_reviews.author: nroz

customer_reviews.title: It's A Great Fan!
customer_reviews.text: We're reno-ing our mountain house and my husband really wanted a fan. I couldn't find one I liked until I came across this one. It's the perfect size for the eating area in our kitchen. It's quiet and it moves air. We love the remote and that the light is built in the fan and not hanging down below it.
customer_reviews.author: PR

customer_reviews.title: Nice quiet fan.
customer_reviews.text: Nice, quiet fan. I do wish the lowest speed setting was a bit lower RPM, as I will likely never use any speed above "lowest" (it has 5 or 6 speeds). The step where you mount the unit to the ceiling (one of the last installation steps) pretty much requires two people — you need to line up two screws with openings in the housing, then twist, then insert 3rd screw into a hole to secure it in place. The light is ok, but on the dim side. If you are replacing a bright light fixture with this, you may need more lighting if you want to keep your lighting brightness the same.
customer_reviews.author: A.P.

customer_reviews.title: This fan is nice looking but a complete pain in the...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these fans for my outdoor patio. My Dad, and experienced handy man, installed them and was not very pleased about the unnecessary complexity built into the process (honestly don't know what it was but he said they did a few things that were I'll advised in the design). The light is not bright. There are zero direct controls so if the fan doesn't work through the remote, you are screwed. For the cost, I wish I could return these, but I'll probably sure my dad would disown me after so much time spent print them up.
customer_reviews.author: L. Wooten

customer_reviews.title: Makes rhythmic rubbing noise.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 and they were installed by a professional electrician. Both made a rhythmic squeaking noise that varied with fan speed. They determined that it was an electrical problem and asked me to rewire, which didn't solve the problem. They then sent me 2 replacement power harnesses, which required me to take down the fan, open up the fan housing, re-assemble the fan, then fully re-wire and install the fan. This also didn't work. I was then sent two brand new replacement fans. One of the new fans still makes the same sound. I have 6-8 hours of labor and several weeks of frustration dealing with this, and I'm stuck with a defective fan. Don't buy this fan.
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: Fan
customer_reviews.text: This fan was low profile, but wish I would've gotten one with the blades a little higher. However, it works out fine & does look nice so we kept it & are looking forward to using it this summer on our screened in porch that we just renovated in the fall. Price was fine & good quality.
customer_reviews.author: barbclay

customer_reviews.title: don't bother
customer_reviews.text: Ordered three of these because I liked the simple design. My husband had a difficult time installing them, but more importantly, after just four months the light continually flickers and it is past the point of being able to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: About the lights... And wattage
customer_reviews.text: Emerson 44" (diameter) Curva Sky fan with light fixture This may be a great fan for you, but I didn't like the light fixture. This uses two MINI candelabra halogen bulbs for a total of 100 W. A mini candelabra is very small (not much bigger than a large flashlight battery); they are bright but get very hot. Between running the fan and running the light, you're going to use 145 W. And you might not get as much light as you want. On the other hand, the mini bulbs make the fan more compact over all, so if dimensions are critical maybe this is the fan for you.
customer_reviews.author: Caveat Emptor

customer_reviews.title: Very good, not quite great
customer_reviews.text: I love the appearance of this fan. It's sleek and stylish. I find that the wattage of the bulbs is fine for our living room. We supplement the overhead light with reading lights around the room. I wish the bulbs weren't halogen (just, why?), but it's fine. The remote control is finicky and takes some getting used to. I wish it were more intuitive. Biggest complaint is that the fan is actually a little weak. Right under it is nice and comfortable but beyond that, you can't feel much air movement.
customer_reviews.author: Deanne O.

customer_reviews.title: Receiver has never worked.
customer_reviews.text: From the minute we had an electrician install this fan, the receiver has never worked. We called the technician for Emerson and he said we would have to buy a new receiver which would total $60 with shipping. I don't remember reading all the bad reviews when I purchased the fan. It sounds like I should have done more research before my purchase. Hopefully this will help someone else. The fan itself is pretty. Pretty useless now.
customer_reviews.author: pg

customer_reviews.title: Great Fan, wrong housing and blades
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these Fans a couple of years ago. I installed the first one right away; The 2nd one was being installed on the patio, which was at a later date due to running the (ELE)power and framing to accommodate the ceiling fan. When I went to open the 2nd fan from the box it had some conveyor road rash across the label which is no big deal. Once we opened the box; the fan was silver brush finish instead of the oil rub bronze. At this point, time had elapsed and I wanted the fan installed, so I continued on. Only advice- Great fans; check for correct color once delivery arrives. Would have given 5 of 5.
customer_reviews.author: Jennibean

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Looks great, but as has been mentioned several times before, the lowest speed is not really "low". It would be nice to have an almost "coast" speed, for ambiance and for slight air movement, like most other ceiling fans operate. I will ding it one star because of. The lights as also mentioned aren't super bright, but for us we don't care. We are using the light for ambiance ONLY. But.....if you plan on this light kit being the only source of light for the room....forget it. Overall, the color (oil rubbed bronze) and the style and quality, are five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Hall

customer_reviews.title: Really like the look of the fan
customer_reviews.text: Really like the look of the fan. Even the highest fan speed is not really high, which works for my application, but could be an issue in some applications. We have two of these fans about 10 feet apart on a patio and did have some issues programming separate remotes, but once we called Emerson and learned we have to program them each while the other one is disconnected from power so that the second programming doesn't override the first, we got them to work. Overall, we are happy with the look and function of the fans.
customer_reviews.author: L Harris

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous fan HOWEVER: BEWARE the Warehouse "Used" Descriptions (Inaccurate, understated)
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful fan! Gorgeous modern lines, completely transformed the room it is in HOWEVER: BEWARE the Warehouse Used descriptions. 5% cosmetic damage on the top of the fan, in reality, there was 20-25% serious scuffing on both sides of all three fan blades. The warehouse description was very VERY understated. I called Amazon and they gave me the runaround but - eventually agreed to a 20% discount to help offset the cost for new blades. Beware the accuracy of Amazon Warehouse "Details".
customer_reviews.author: AdventureGirl

customer_reviews.title: Looks great. Moves air well. But remote is a pain and the light is too dim.
customer_reviews.text: I probably would not purchase this again because the remote is a bit difficult to use. Instead I would have gone with the type of fans that has the control installed directly into the wall. The light is also really too dim to be of much use, and can’t be changed out to a higher wattage. Other than that the fan does move air well, and looks great. I installed three of them in my apartments and have yet to find out how well they will hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Horrible quality fan. Overly difficult installation. Looks decent but the design is awful.
customer_reviews.text: Horrible quality. Screws are cheap and strip very easily, especially when the holes don't line up as they should. From the start, when installing the blades the screw holes did not line up well. I should have stopped there but liked the look of this fan and really wanted it to work. Installation proceeded to be a complete pain. I have installed a number of fans and this is poorly engineered. On the high setting it does not move much air. I have another matching smaller unit on the way a will be returning without opening the box. Now I just have to spend the time to dismantle this installed fan (with stripped screws), and return.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this fan in May 2018. Now, two years later, the remote no longer communicates with the receiver in the fan so it is trash. It would cost $65 including postage to get a new receiver plus paying an electrician to replace it and mount it again. So not worth the money! And it would probably go bad again in a short time. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Nel

customer_reviews.title: "I am now a fan of Emerson Fans"
customer_reviews.text: Installed 2 of these on our front porch. They look and work great. Installation could not have been easier. 15 minutes each. I did not change the remote settings so one remote controls both fans. The existing wall switch turns them off and when we turn them back on they are at the same light and fan speed settings from when they were turned off. I will be switching to LEDs eventually. I just ordered two more for bedrooms. I am now of fan of Emerson Fans.
customer_reviews.author: Roger P

customer_reviews.title: Bad lighting unit.
customer_reviews.text: Like several other reviewers have said, the lighting unit is faulty. It uses those tiny G8 bulbs that burn super hot. I guess it just gets too hot inside there and it causes the bulbs to flash on and off at random. I plan to rewire it with a different kind of socket and light. I was planning to buy several of these, but I'm glad I just got one to test it. I'll rewire one, but not a bunch of them. Other than the bad lighting, its good looking and solid and an otherwise nice unit.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald J. Widner

customer_reviews.title: Contemporary elegance at its finest
customer_reviews.text: Aesthetically pleasing! Performs as great as it looks! Just be sure to set it in a rare frequency so your neighbor won’t be waking you up with the light on. Pushes air like nobody’s business! Stable with a low whisper on the highest setting. Light is nothing to write home about, but it’s available nonetheless. Skeptic of Emerson, but proved me wrong.
customer_reviews.author: gamp7979

customer_reviews.title: Quiet, functional fan, but a larger footprint than I'd like
customer_reviews.text: This fan is quiet and generates a nice cooling breeze. The base is bigger than I expected; I feel it draws attention to itself, and I'm not as into it aesthetically as I'd hoped. But it's fine. It's nice that it came with the remote. We had an electrician install it, so I can't speak to ease of installation.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Perry

customer_reviews.title: stay away!
customer_reviews.text: I am giving this product a 1 star cause I can't give 0. Nothing more than problems since it was installed. First the reverse module didnt work. Then waiting for the part to come. Once part installed .... didnt work! and the new part worked (spinning only in one direction) for a week and died!! Amazon has been great and refunded the cost of the product, but unless you are an electrician, you get hit with the cost of initial install, install the replacement part and now..taking it down to install another one. Stay as far as you can from this brand!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Betún

customer_reviews.title: Horrible purchase
customer_reviews.text: Horrible purchase. I bought this fan bc I needed some more light in the room. I searched for halogen fixture which should give off a nice white light What a waste. This fixture hardly gives off any light - not much more than a night light would! And the light is so yellow. Do not buy this fan if you are looking to use the light!!
customer_reviews.author: Iwc

customer_reviews.title: Junk—Stopped Working After Two Days
customer_reviews.text: Junk! The first time it was shipped missing two key pieces, including the lower housing and glass bowl for the light. I had already installed it by the time I had realized those pieces were missing. Amazon customer service was great and sent a new fan with the replacement parts. It worked and looked great at first. But everything stopped working after two days. $200 plus dollars and hours of aggravation later, I have completely a non-functioning ceiling fan hanging from my ceiling.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Carlson

customer_reviews.title: ... had this fan for a few months now and love it! The only issue I had was that ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had this fan for a few months now and love it! The only issue I had was that one of the mounting holes was machined incorrectly, so after about a half hour of futzing around with it I realized it just didn't line up, so had to leave the screw out in order to mount it. Other than that the fan runs great, doesn't wobble, super quiet, and moves a lot of air, and the light looks great. Only thing holding it back from 5 stars is the one hole that wasn't manufactured in the right spot, I'm talking about the very top mounting holes where you turn the fan into place to lock it.
customer_reviews.author: Juddog

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful fan but does not last!
customer_reviews.text: 3 stars because it is beautiful! But the first one I received I had to return because the remote receiver did not work! Of course this was after installing it! Second one has only been installed for just over 2 years and not used very much and now the fan motor has died! I have given up on this item and will be replacing it with a non-Emerson product.
customer_reviews.author: Alix

customer_reviews.title: Transmitter doesn't work after 1 week - but replacement on its way!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this fan for a week. And now the transmitter doesn't work. I'll call Emerson on Monday. But the thought of having to buy a new transmitter/remote for $50 or heaven forbid the receiver for $80, is infuriating! UPDATE on 9-1-16: I finally got a chance to call Emerson and they said that it is a faulty transmitter and they are sending a replacement!! Yay!! I've upped the rating to 4 starts and will change to 5 when the replacement arrives and the fan works!! If you have issues, call them!!
customer_reviews.author: L. Smart

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking with good remote BUT
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking with good remote BUT, after a little rain it blew. I made the mistake of waiting too long to qualify for a return, but this is not an outdoor fan.
customer_reviews.author: TMichaelO

customer_reviews.title: Keep Cool with this stylish fan
customer_reviews.text: This fan is so cool, that it's hot. This is a powerful and smooth fan. Like the BMW logo, the curve design gives it an airplane propeller look. It has a remote with variable speeds, plus light, which has great illumination. It's a bit of a "arm" ache to install. Best to install with 2 person assist. I like this fan so much that I purchased an additional 2 for a total of 3 for all bedrooms in house. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Retro-Zen

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: For those having issues with the fan making noise, I had the same problem...but it turned out to be an issue with the switch, not the fan. The previous light I had in the room had a switch with a dimmer function. This caused the fan to make loud noise, which was eliminated when I changed the switch. Sleek looking fan, quiet, and moves air well. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cecil

customer_reviews.title: Great fan, questionable remote.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome fan/light combo, especially where height is a concern. Extraordinarily quiet and smooth. Occasionally my remote freaks out and the light (on the remote) blinks and causes unintended fan/light actions.
customer_reviews.author: Stonelake

customer_reviews.title: Easy install
customer_reviews.text: Easy install for a 61 year old woman and nice contemporary look. I waited to attach blades until base was mounted on ceiling which made the install even easier.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne B

customer_reviews.title: Elegant, low-profile, not hard to install
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this fan. It's beautiful and keeps a low profile above our bed. I was able to install it myself, and I am not exactly a handyman. I recommend getting a—that was a huge help for stabilizing the fan, and it wasn't hard to install.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Ward

customer_reviews.title: Cool fan
customer_reviews.text: This is the second fan unit of this type we have purchased. Works good, quiet and smooth. Looks better than a lot of fan units. Sleek styling.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Looks good but defective units
customer_reviews.text: Great looking fan, sleek and well packaged. Fan arrived with defective receiver/remote and audible "tick" from motor housing. Emerson customer support was great, they were local (Kansas City) and sent a replacement no questions asked. 2nd unit worked for 1 day before receiver/remote stopped and audible motor hum noise. Thankfully Amazon replacement to the rescue, would not recommend fan.
customer_reviews.author: David Baillargeon

customer_reviews.title: Worst design and installation process ever!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this fan! The design and installation process is extremely cumbersome to the point that after the fan was 90% installed it had to be uninstalled, boxed up and returned. Since the large remote receiver is not prewired and takes up to much room, it makes it impossible to install the outside housing to the ceiling bracket. Stay away if you want to keep your sanity.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great looking quiet fan, instructions could be better
customer_reviews.text: nice looking super quiet fan. installation was quick. we had a little trouble with wiring the receiver for the remote as the instructions that come with it are not very detailed. there is a video on utube for emerson CF144 showing exactly how to wire it. After watching it several times we figured it out.
customer_reviews.author: elf

customer_reviews.title: Great Fan!
customer_reviews.text: Installed three of these fans on my awning in the backyard. They work excellent, push a lot of air and look great. Love the fact that the upper portion of the fan is completely sealed to reduce the amount of dust that collects over time.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Great looking fan but
customer_reviews.text: Great looking fan but........Installed it and it didn't work. Called customer service and they sent a new remote control which was faulty. Was a bit disappointed when it was installed and it didn't work but the customer service was excellent and the fan looks and works great now.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: NOT LED lights as described:  actually has 2 50W incandescant bulbs
customer_reviews.text: The product description says LED lights but the product I received has 2 50 W Incandescant bulbs
customer_reviews.author: Suznmarie

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Great Value - easy to install, quiet, and elegant. Makes a ton of wind.
customer_reviews.author: S. L. Seamans

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: We purchased 2 of these fans 2 years ago. Both have stopped working. When I called customer service I was basically told we were SOL because these fans only have a 1 year warranty. I would not recommend the Emerson brand for any product they sell. These were expensive fans. Had I known the poor quality I would have purchased the similar Minka Aire fans.
customer_reviews.author: Elmo

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Very quiet love the 6 speeds hate the fact it doesn't have an led light that's why only 4 stars .Install was a breeze you can assemble everything before going up the ladder and just hook it up make your connection and close it up .
customer_reviews.author: H. Lora

customer_reviews.title: NOT AS HAPPY...
customer_reviews.text: Fan has a "Twanging" sound when running. The Reverse option does not work. This is the second Emerson Fan we have put in our bedroom. We spent much more for the 1st, and have been very happy with it. Quiet and very reliable. Was hoping this fan would .compair. Also, the new remote works on both fans.
customer_reviews.author: Chicks

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, Flawless, DC Rocks!
customer_reviews.text: This was the best purchase I made all year. DC motor rocks! Silent, reversible. Made our living room livable year round (New England). We can use the built in light to read by if within about five foot radius of the fan. It's a pleasant light color too (soft) for the living room.
customer_reviews.author: DaveG

customer_reviews.title: Nice fan but no perfect
customer_reviews.text: Like the quality of this product. Very slick look. I will add an extension to lower the fan for high ceilings
customer_reviews.author: Itsme

customer_reviews.title: Great fan!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful fan perfect for a bedroom where the low rise hugs the ceiling nicely.
customer_reviews.author: EYEGAL

customer_reviews.title: Easy Step-by-Step installation
customer_reviews.text: Emerson Ceiling Fans CF152WW Curva Sky 52-Inch outdoor/Indoor White Fan. Easy Step-by-Step installation. Medium Level electrical and mechanical expertise required.
customer_reviews.author: L. Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Great fans
customer_reviews.text: Great product however I have two exactly the same on a long patio. They really are great but the remote works both at the same time unless your standing in certain spots in the patio which then only one comes on and then it’s sometimes a challenge to get them in sync again
customer_reviews.author: Kirk W. Youngstead

customer_reviews.title: Guys were nice, but could not do much to help me
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievably unreliable. Worked just long enough to be past the return window and then quit. Tried to work with Emerson, the manufacturer. Their warranty department is an independent company, not even part of Emerson. Guys were nice, but could not do much to help me. Emerson refused to do anything because as they put it "the payment was made to Amazon and Emerson's contract is with them." So we're out $270...
customer_reviews.author: HelSky

customer_reviews.title: Loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, very quiet, very good lighting for a small bedroom and puts out a good amount of air. Very modern. It is hard to find a modern fan at this price point and highly suggest it to people that like clean modern lines.
customer_reviews.author: DCB

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking fan
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking fan. Extremely dissatisfied with the high speed setting. It would be the equivalent to the medium speed setting in most fans. Bummer - already hung
customer_reviews.author: lila

customer_reviews.title: great fan--but faulty remote
customer_reviews.text: love this fan--stylish and functional--update-- the fan is still working but I had to buy a new remote after only 12 months--new remote was 43$!!
customer_reviews.author: R. cobb

customer_reviews.title: Great sleek, modern fan.
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect fan for our kitchen. It was the only one we could find that didn't require a light kit and that looked sleek and modern. Mounts solid to ceiling, although we had it installed professionally, so it should be.
customer_reviews.author: Homunculus

customer_reviews.title: Poor me with poor quality of this ceiling fan
customer_reviews.text: I bought this fan in 2015, it died just 2 years! the sound began after it installed, i did not return because I spent money to find an electrician to install, the life was just 2 years. i would never trust the seller and this brand name. Warning... Don't buy it!!
customer_reviews.author: frankie

customer_reviews.title: Good Solid Fan, and Quiet
customer_reviews.text: Fan went in without a issue. Runs extremely quiet. We've run this fan every night since we installed it. All functions controlled by remote. It's been a month and so far it's been a great add.
customer_reviews.author: Louis F.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful for porch
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for farmhouse porch! Purchased 2 in graphite and they have clean sstraightforward lines for a strong look . Installation simple with good instructions and well packaged. So few nice wet rated fans that are flushmount out there - these are a win for me!!!
customer_reviews.author: MISF K

customer_reviews.title: Great fan. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Looks a million times better than the cheap, bronze colored one it replaced. Low profile, quiet, good airflow and great remote. if you have 8 foot ceilings, you should consider this fan.
customer_reviews.author: Ace Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Stunning!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this fan! It is sleek and stylish and very quiet! Moves a lot of air around the room and gives off plenty of light.
customer_reviews.author: Rick B

customer_reviews.title: I think its a quality product and has nice features just the way it is
customer_reviews.text: The fan is modern looking and works well for our purposes. The install was straight forward but you need some skills to get through it (took about 2-hours). I think its a quality product and has nice features just the way it is.
customer_reviews.author: William Baxter

customer_reviews.title: I feel so stupid to purchases anything on line any more
customer_reviews.text: 5 months and the remote doesn't work. I feel so stupid to purchases anything on line any more. What the heck . You pay an electrician to install. Is their any way I can fix this without replacing?? totally sucks. Please advise.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Easy install, modern sleek and affordable!
customer_reviews.text: Sleek, low profile, modern and affordable. I actually ended up installing the light with it since it had a dimmer and I'm happy I did. It has a nice glow to it that other ceiling fans don't have. It is super quiet and the multiple fan speeds and light dimming is a plus. I would definately use this to outfir my whole house.
customer_reviews.author: GBM

customer_reviews.title: The fan itself is great. The only issue is the lighting
customer_reviews.text: The fan itself is great. The only issue is the lighting. The included bulbs are not very bright and soft white. Because they are only e12 bulbs, there are no available led bulbs on the market that give off enough light either
customer_reviews.author: Donny

customer_reviews.title: Puts out nice breeze.
customer_reviews.text: Get lots of complements on this fan. Puts out nice breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Nuss

customer_reviews.title: "One of my biggest fans" this fan is.
customer_reviews.text: This fan is awesome. Just wish it had LED light instead. Remote Control works great. No noise. Looks sleek and modern. Happy!
customer_reviews.author: TackleBerry

customer_reviews.title: Not what it was supposed to be.....
customer_reviews.text: Was supposed to be ORB, as the package stated. Inside was brushed nickel - poor QC in China......
customer_reviews.author: Nick Saccketti

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Technical Support
customer_reviews.text: Very quiet and attractive fan, but giving this product 5 stars primarily because of the OUTSTANDING post-sale technical support provided by Emerson's contract service provider, Carroll Parts, of Kansas City, MO. They were immediately available and super-responsive in helping me troubleshoot a difficult installation.
customer_reviews.author: Edie Odell

customer_reviews.title: I might buy another one for the living room
customer_reviews.text: I've installed 2 of these fans in my bedrooms. The low profile is what I need since i have low ceilings and am 6' tall. Whisper quiet and the remote is handy
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 26 months
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the 44" fan in May 2015. All worked well and then without warning stopped working 2 years and 2 months later. A fan over $250 should last longer than 2 years :(
customer_reviews.author: pj

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Great fan for our deck off of the master bath!
customer_reviews.author: Moon Creek Farm

customer_reviews.title: Emerson Ceiling Fan is great!
customer_reviews.text: The Emerson Ceiling Fan is great. It is easy to install. It looks very contemporary. The remote control let you control the speed of the fan and dim the light.
customer_reviews.author: B Kain

customer_reviews.title: Excellent fan
customer_reviews.text: Very nice good looking fan made of great materials. Love the wireless controls to adjust both fan speed and light intensity. More modern look and low profile fits out decor and 8' ceilings.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolas Hartman

customer_reviews.title: I'm a Fan!!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this fan for a small screened in porch. The fan looks great and runs well. It was delivered by the USPS in its original packaging. Installation instructions were not provided, which may be an issue if you have had little experience in hanging fans (a quick search on the internet and you can find the installation instructions for this exact model). When I saw the two tiny halogen bulbs I was a little worried that there would not be enough light, however, that's not the case. Great fan for a small outdoor (or indoor) area. Looks really sleek!!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Brown

customer_reviews.title: Love the remote control
customer_reviews.text: I would give 10 stars if I could. These fans are fabulous for a sleek, modern, minimalist esthetic. Love the remote control. Love that we don't see mechanisms. Completely happy with these!
customer_reviews.author: Good Movie Fan

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice product!
customer_reviews.text: Im going to purchase two more of these for my other bedroom. Looks great, lights well, moves the air. Did I mention it looks great?
customer_reviews.author: J. Minor

customer_reviews.title: Great fan
customer_reviews.text: Looks great in the room. A big improvement over the old fashioned fan that it replaced. Make sure that you install the remote. Otherwise, you can't change the fan rotation direction.
customer_reviews.author: Tom DiMartino

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service Very Helpful
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this fan online for my small den. My installer had trouble hooking it up but I called Emerson's customer service line and the man I spoke to was extremely helpful. I gave him my model number and he quickly was able to tell the installer how the wiring should go. I ended up putting in LED (cool white) lights in place of the halogen ones that were included. I love the look of the light and the fan gives good air flow and no noise when operating. I am pleased with this fan and the great customer service. I would recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL AND QUITE
customer_reviews.text: BEAUTIFUL AND QUITE! This was exactly what i had hoped for. The remote i great. Mounted itcto the wall and serces as an on and off switch. Would defknitly reccomend this item.
customer_reviews.author: michael qualls

customer_reviews.title: 44: Emerson ceiling fan
customer_reviews.text: we bought two and the smaller unit, for whatever reason, refuses to turn off. Since the other 52" version works perfectly, we suspect this is a manufacturing defect. will attempt to reach out to the manufacturer. If/when resolved, will update review
customer_reviews.author: Steve Mueller

customer_reviews.title: Definitely fits the description of product
customer_reviews.text: Very sleek and contemporary looking, efficient with good speed and quiet
customer_reviews.author: Pauli

customer_reviews.title: This is a really terrible product. All of the screws are as soft ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a really terrible product. All of the screws are as soft as butter and strip easily. The screw holes don't line up so it is almost impossible to attach the fan motor to the ceiling bracket. While the description says you can dim the light you can't, at least not with the bulb it comes with. I called their customer service to confirm this. Also the receiver in the ceiling was defective and would not respond to the remote. Stay away from this one. Amazon was very gracious to allow me to return this and I think they should not sell it as it is aheadache for the customer and foe Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Doolittle

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: Nice fan. Bought based on experience with same model in another room for several years now. Not stylish or fancy. Pretty quiet especially at lower speeds. Remote operation is not as solid as it could be; otherwise it would have been 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Gerth

customer_reviews.title: So happy!
customer_reviews.text: So happy with this purchase! Ceiling fans are expensive so I did a lot of research and looking around. This one was easy to install and works great. Looks fantastic on our screened in patio.
customer_reviews.author: Liz B

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice and quiet. Easy to install. Best part was the price. Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: mike hanaway

customer_reviews.title: Nice fan. Quiet
customer_reviews.text: Nice fan. Quiet, moves air from slow to fast by depressing series of buttons on remote. Compact remote is a nice size.
customer_reviews.author: BarbaraM

customer_reviews.title: Silent fan!
customer_reviews.text: Great ceiling fan and light combo. Used it in all our bedrooms and the fan is absolutely silent! This was not the case with other fan brands. Light is also brighter.
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: This is a beautiful fan it is a class act on it's own
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful fan it is a class act on it's own. Will easily fit into modern or any other style you like. And it works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Watson

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but dim light and poor airflow
customer_reviews.text: This fan looks really nice but the light is very dim and airflow is poor. The light streaming from my closet is brighter than this overhead light. We even paid to have an electrician come out and make sure it was hooks up properly. Just not meeting my satisfaction.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: warrenty
customer_reviews.text: Hello- I purchased 2 of these in Jan 2019.One has stopped working . Is there a warranty?
customer_reviews.author: susan e. Uzzan

customer_reviews.title: Loved it so much, purchased a second one!
customer_reviews.text: Quiet. No vibration. But.,,,a three blade fan will cut through the air more noticeably than a five. Love the design and it's simplicity.
customer_reviews.author: HowdyAloha

customer_reviews.title: Stylish Fan
customer_reviews.text: Very stylish, easy to install and got it at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: D. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Ceiling fan is made with excellent materials. Ceiling fan motor is very quite
customer_reviews.text: DYI Installation was straight forward following the instructions. Ceiling fan is made with excellent materials. Ceiling fan motor is very quite. Low profile and modern look design enhances and complements any room. I will purchase another one and will recommend it to my friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: BocaWarrior

customer_reviews.title: This fan is awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: This fan is awesome!!!!!!!! My husband didn't have any trouble installing it and we used it all summer. It is installed in our bedroom and we never needed to turn the air conditioner on. The brightness of the light is perfect, also. AND, on on of the home improvement shows, I saw where they installed this exact same fan in their bedroom. LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Char

customer_reviews.title: Fun and Fancy Fans
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a smart-looking and unique fan that was flush mounted or as close to the ceiling as j could find and these do the trick. I have installed three in my home, one with a light and two without and they're very smart looking. Not so functional/traditional looking and priced about right.
customer_reviews.author: NH

customer_reviews.title: Sleek, modern, quiet
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Sleek, modern, quiet. Hubby said it was easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Leann W.

customer_reviews.title: Wow is all I can say.
customer_reviews.text: Not only is it the coolest looking, it runs quiet, and makes a hit on my porch. When it arrived the trim was cracked and this company immediately addressed the problem and sent me a replacement at no cost. I would highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: JodiRealtor

customer_reviews.title: Sleek
customer_reviews.text: We love it. Perfect addition to our renovated kitchen. On high speed it does make a slight noise but we barely notice it now.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Keohane

customer_reviews.title: Great fan
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install. I hung this in the bedroom and the fan is very quiet even at low speeds.
customer_reviews.author: Don

product_meta.title: Emerson, CF144LWW Curva Sky 44-inch Indoor/Outdoor Ceiling Fan, 3-Blade Ceiling Fan with LED Lighting and 6-Speed Remote Control
product_meta.description:
Color:Appliance White (Led Light)| Size:44-Inch

Improve the air circulation and design aesthetic of any smaller space with the Emerson CF144LWW Curva Sky 44-Inch modern Ceiling Fan. Both attractive and practical, the integrated LED light fixture provides long-lasting and efficient lighting while enhancing the fan's modern look. Offering versatility you'll love, this modern ceiling fan has a removable, no-light cover so that you can choose installation with or without the light.

Its powerful 153 mm x 18 mm motor with a 12-degree blade pitch offers improved airflow so that you'll stay cool and comfortable. The included 6-speed LED remote control with receiver allows you to adjust the fan speed, light intensity and reverse direction. In addition, the remote comes with a convenient wall bracket for storing the remote when not in use. This Curva Sky fan is also compatible with the Emerson 6-Speed LED Wall Control (model SW605, sold separately).

Ideal for lower ceiling heights, the hugger ceiling fan design is a low-profile option ideal where flush-mounting is preferred. The ceiling fan is wet rated and the blades are weather-resistant, making it suitable for indoor use and for outdoor use in locations such as porches, patios and decks. A great choice for lofts and apartments, this indoor ceiling fan has 3 blades and a 44-inch blade span to circulate air smoothly and quickly.

With sleek style to match its functionality, this flush mount ceiling fan features fan housing and blades in an appliance white finish and an opal matte glass that look sharp in any living space. The Curva Sky modern ceiling fan comes in a selection of finishes and sizes. It has an RPM range of 80 to 250 and an airflow rate of up to 3800 CFM.

For the past 125 years and counting, Emerson has set an industry standard with high quality, versatile and timeless indoor and outdoor ceiling fans. Designed for both style and function, Emerson fans complement any design aesthetic and help you save on heating and cooling costs, keeping your home comfortable year-round.
feature_bullets: Powerful 153 mm x 18 mm motor with 12-degree blade pitch delivers improved airflow to that of typical ceiling fans
Integrated LED light fixture for maximum performance and energy efficiency
Features clean design lines, appliance white finish and opal matte glass for a stylish, modern look
Modern ceiling fan comes with a removable, no-light cover plate so you can choose between lighted and fan-only options
Includes a 6-speed LED remote control with receiver that allows you to easily select fan speeds, light intensity and airflow direction

specifications.Included Components: Ceiling Fan, Fan Blades, Hardware, LED light kit, Flush Mount, Control
specifications.Warranty Description: All products purchased have a 30-day replacement parts policy to ensure a fully working item. All products are covered under a 1-Year warranty when purchased on Amazon. The warranty period begins on the day the product is originally shipped. The warranty covers all of the items and conditions identified in the original manufacturers warranty. Some of the items specifically not covered by the warranty are loss and theft, water damage, customer abuse, and finish detoriation due to UV or coastal exposure.
specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars334 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
